CustomField.description: If a Billing Schedule has been invoiced and the user does a mid-cycle amend and the amount per period has not changed then still create a credit and a debit Billing Schedule, even though the credit and debit will be for the same amount and will cancel one another out.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a Billing Schedule has been invoiced and the user does a mid-cycle amend and the amount per period has not changed then still create a credit and a debit Billing Schedule, even though the credit and debit will be for the same amount and will cancel one
CustomField.label: Create redundant Billing Schedules
